p: Nucleic acids and viral particles were reconstituted according to the manufacturers instruction. For lower limit of detection (LLOD) studies 100μl of the Vircell total run control (whole viral particles which are provided with a certificate specifying their copy number) and 10μl of Vircell DENV-1, DENV-2, DENV-3, DENV-4 and chikungunya RNA samples (again provided with a certificate specifying their copy number) were individually two fold serially diluted in a total volume of 100 μL molecular grade water (G-biosciences, St Louis, USA) or human serum to mimic actual clinical samples (H4522, Sigma, Sydney, Australia).
